content.description: Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the graph below which shows the monthly average CO2 concentration, in parts per million, as measured at Mauna Loa Observatory in Hawaii.
content.question: According to the graph, the increase in CO2 concentration, in parts per million, between 1970 and 1990 is closest to

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Describe relationships among variables in data represented.
